contactSectionSubtitle:

pageDescription: The personal site of Youri Lamoureux, a Canadian reinventing himself in tech while documenting the journey. Expect projects, experiments, and reflections on learning, family, and creativity.

OGImage.alt: Screenshot of a web portfolio the personal portfolio of Youri Lamoureux. A dark, modern design that highlights his journey of reinvention in tech, projects in web development, and an authentic blog about learning, family, and creativity.

fallbackImage.alt: Generic fallback image used when no project or blog image is available.
